trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Myers
There were no other sightings in Fort Myers on or around August 22nd 2012
Summary: Oval like aircraft flew east to west in a straight line, no sound.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn Florida, I was swimming late at night at around 10:45 to relax a little before bed. Suddenly, I looked up and saw a black oval like object fly east to west. It had five lights on the back and no visible engine. I only saw it for a few seconds before I couldn't see it through the trees. I was scared to death.
